statements: SELECT * FROM public_transport_schedules;
SELECT route_name, start_time, end_time FROM public_transport_schedules WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, route_name FROM public_transport_schedules WHERE start_time > '10:00:00';
SELECT * FROM public_transport_schedules ORDER BY update_time DESC;
SELECT id, route_name, start_time, end_time FROM public_transport_schedules WHERE route_name LIKE '%Express%';
SELECT * FROM public_transport_schedules WHERE id = 1;
SELECT route_name, start_time, end_time FROM public_transport_schedules WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT id, route_name, end_time FROM public_transport_schedules WHERE start_time >= '08:00:00' AND end_time <= '10:00:00';
SELECT route_name FROM public_transport_schedules WHERE end_time > start_time AND end_time IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM public_transport_schedules WHERE route_name LIKE '%Express%' ORDER BY update_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM public_transportation_routes;
SELECT route_id, route_name FROM public_transportation_routes WHERE route_type = 'Bus';
SELECT schedule_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM public_transportation_schedules ORDER BY departure_time DESC;
SELECT route_name, route_type FROM public_transportation_routes WHERE route_name LIKE '%Express%';
SELECT schedule_id, route_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM public_transportation_schedules WHERE route_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM public_transportation_schedules WHERE departure_time > '12:00:00';
SELECT route_name, route_type FROM public_transportation_routes WHERE route_type = 'Bus';
SELECT schedule_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM public_transportation_schedules ORDER BY departure_time DESC;

SELECT route_name, COUNT(*) AS total_schedules FROM public_transportation_routes JOIN public_transportation_schedules ON public_transportation_routes.route_id = public_transportation_schedules.route_id GROUP BY route_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;

SELECT route_name, departure_time, arrival_time FROM public_transportation_routes INNER JOIN public_transportation_schedules ON public_transportation_routes.route_id = public_transportation_schedules.route_id WHERE departure_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '10:00:00';
SELECT * FROM schedules;
SELECT schedule_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM schedules WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT route_id, AVG(EXTRACT(HOUR FROM arrival_time - departure_time)) AS avg_duration FROM schedules GROUP BY route_id;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE route_name LIKE 'Route%';
SELECT schedule_id, status, update_text FROM updates WHERE status = 'Delayed';
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE departure_time > '2022-01-01' AND route_id = 1;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE end_location = 'New York';
SELECT update_id, status, update_text FROM updates ORDER BY update_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT schedule_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM schedules WHERE route_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY departure_time DESC;
SELECT r.route_name, s.departure_time, s.arrival_time, u.status FROM routes r INNER JOIN schedules s ON r.route_id = s.route_id LEFT JOIN updates u ON s.schedule_id = u.schedule_id;
SELECT * FROM routes;
SELECT route_name, route_description FROM routes;
SELECT stop_name, stop_location FROM stops ORDER BY stop_name DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM schedules WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_name, vehicle_type FROM vehicles WHERE route_id = 2 ORDER BY vehicle_name ASC;
SELECT route_name, route_description FROM routes LIMIT 5;
SELECT stop_name, stop_location FROM stops ORDER BY stop_name DESC;
SELECT route_name, COUNT(*) AS total_stops FROM routes JOIN schedules ON routes.route_id = schedules.route_id GROUP BY route_name;
SELECT vehicle_name, vehicle_type, route_name FROM vehicles INNER JOIN routes ON vehicles.route_id = routes.route_id WHERE vehicle_type = 'Bus';
SELECT schedule_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM schedules WHERE departure_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM Routes;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM Routes ORDER BY route_name DESC;
SELECT stop_name, location FROM Stops WHERE location = 'City Center';
SELECT route_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM Schedule WHERE departure_time >= '08:00:00';
SELECT driver_name, vehicle_number FROM Drivers JOIN Vehicles ON Drivers.vehicle_id = Vehicles.vehicle_id;
SELECT * FROM Routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM Routes WHERE route_name LIKE '%Express%' ORDER BY route_name ASC;

SELECT s.stop_name, s.location, r.route_name, sch.departure_time, sch.arrival_time FROM Stops s JOIN Schedule sch ON s.stop_id = sch.stop_id JOIN Routes r ON r.route_id = sch.route_id WHERE sch.departure_time > '08:00:00';
SELECT d.driver_id, d.driver_name, v.vehicle_number, v.vehicle_type FROM Drivers d JOIN Vehicles v ON d.vehicle_id = v.vehicle_id WHERE v.vehicle_type = 'Bus' ORDER BY d.driver_name DESC;

SELECT r.route_name, s.stop_name, sch.departure_time, sch.arrival_time FROM Routes r JOIN Schedule sch ON r.route_id = sch.route_id JOIN Stops s ON s.stop_id = sch.stop_id WHERE r.route_name = 'Metro Route' OR s.location = 'City Center' ORDER BY sch.departure_time ASC;
